item.title: Placing text to bottom right of screen?
item.dc:creator: @BamBam BamBam
item.description:
@BamBam wrote:

i haven’t quite figured this out, but in my server, it has my text on top of the screen saying the server name and how many people online, ive jumped the text around a few different times, but i could never get it to that area i wanted

heres the code.

public void writePlayers1() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126(" @red@My Server Name", 13591); sendFrame126(" @whi@Players Online: @gre@" +players, 13592); sendFrame126("", 13593); sendFrame126("", 13594); sendFrame126("", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13596); sendFrame126("", 13597); sendFrame126("", 13598); sendFrame126("", 13599); sendFrame126("", 13600); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); }

ive tested all those frames and yet can i get it to the other side of the screen

heres a picture of what im trying to do, only one i could find lol sorry

i just think im missing the frames needed for it. but im not sure. any help would be appericated
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 03:07:01 PM[/size][hr]Fedexer, help lol

Read full topic
